overall: The web UI provides a login interface for Lotte Mart's online shopping platform. Users can log in using their registered account (email/phone and password) or via an OTP sent to their email/phone. Alternative login methods include Zalo, Google, Kakao Talk, and Apple ID. Users can switch between login methods using tabs ('Tài khoản' and 'Bằng OTP'). There's a link to recover forgotten passwords and another link for new users to register ('Đăng ký'). A language selector is available at the top right, offering Vietnamese, Korean, and English. The interface is visually divided, with branding on the left and the login form on the right. Overall usability seems standard for a login page, providing multiple authentication options. Accessibility appears considered with clear labels and standard form elements, though full testing (screen reader, keyboard navigation) is recommended. Potential improvements could include clearer error handling feedback and visual loading indicators during submission.

widgets.name: LOTTE MART Logo
widgets.description: Displays the Lotte Mart brand logo in the header.

widgets.name: Language Selector
widgets.description: A dropdown menu that allows users to select the interface language. Options shown include Tiếng Việt, 한국어, and English. Clicking it reveals the language options.

widgets.name: LOTTE MART Logo (Large)
widgets.description: A larger version of the Lotte Mart brand logo prominently displayed on the left side of the page.

widgets.name: Slogan Text
widgets.description: Displays the slogan 'Kênh đi chợ Online của LOTTE Mart'.

widgets.name: Login Form
widgets.description: The main container for all login-related elements.

widgets.name: Đăng nhập Title
widgets.description: The title 'Đăng nhập' (Login) for the form.

widgets.name: Tài Khoản Tab
widgets.position: Top Left of Login Form Tabs
widgets.description: A tab labeled 'Tài Khoản' (Account). Clicking this tab shows the fields for logging in with email/phone and password.

widgets.name: Bằng OTP Tab
widgets.position: Top Right of Login Form Tabs
widgets.description: A tab labeled 'Bằng OTP' (By OTP). Clicking this tab shows the field for entering email/phone to receive an OTP.

widgets.name: Email/Số điện thoại Input
widgets.description: Input field labeled 'Email/Số điện thoại*'. Requires the user to enter their registered email address or phone number. Marked as mandatory. Used for both standard login and OTP request.

widgets.name: Mật khẩu Input
widgets.description: Input field labeled 'Mật khẩu*' (Password). Requires the user to enter their password. Marked as mandatory. Includes an icon to toggle password visibility. Only visible when the 'Tài Khoản' tab is selected.

widgets.name: Password Visibility Toggle
widgets.description: An icon button within the password field that allows the user to show or hide the entered password.

widgets.name: Quên mật khẩu? Link
widgets.description: A link labeled 'Quên mật khẩu?' (Forgot password?). Clicking this likely initiates the password recovery process. Only visible when the 'Tài Khoản' tab is selected.

widgets.name: Đăng nhập Button
widgets.description: Button labeled 'Đăng nhập' (Login). Submits the entered email/phone and password for authentication. Only visible when the 'Tài Khoản' tab is selected.

widgets.name: Gửi mã OTP Button
widgets.description: Button labeled 'Gửi mã OTP' (Send OTP code). Submits the entered email/phone to request an OTP for login. Only visible when the 'Bằng OTP' tab is selected.

widgets.name: Hoặc đăng nhập với Text
widgets.description: Text 'Hoặc đăng nhập với' (Or log in with) indicating alternative social login options.

widgets.name: Zalo Login Button
widgets.position: Inside Login Form, Social Login Section
widgets.description: Button with the Zalo logo and text 'Zalo'. Allows users to log in using their Zalo account.

widgets.name: Google Login Button
widgets.position: Inside Login Form, Social Login Section
widgets.description: Button with the Google logo and text 'Google'. Allows users to log in using their Google account.

widgets.name: Kakao Talk Login Button
widgets.position: Inside Login Form, Social Login Section
widgets.description: Button with the Kakao Talk logo and text 'Kakao Talk'. Allows users to log in using their Kakao Talk account.

widgets.name: Apple ID Login Button
widgets.position: Inside Login Form, Social Login Section
widgets.description: Button with the Apple logo and text 'Apple ID'. Allows users to log in using their Apple ID.

widgets.name: Registration Prompt Text
widgets.description: Text 'Quý khách chưa có tài khoản?' (Don't have an account yet?).

widgets.name: Đăng ký Link
widgets.description: A link labeled 'Đăng ký' (Register). Navigates the user to the account registration page.

widgets.name: Tiếng Việt Language Option
widgets.description: Option to select Vietnamese language. Represented by the Vietnamese flag and text 'Tiếng Việt'.

widgets.name: 한국어 Language Option
widgets.description: Option to select Korean language. Represented by the South Korean flag and text '한국어'.

widgets.name: English Language Option
widgets.description: Option to select English language. Represented by the UK flag and text 'English'.

widgets.name: OTP Helper Text
widgets.description: Helper text providing instructions and notes for OTP login, including advice for VinaPhone users and mentioning SPEED L registration.
